Intents.name: get_cluster_status
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to retrieve status of nodes within Rubrik Cluster

utterances.utterance: status of my cluster
is the cluster doing okay
How is my cluster doing
What is the cluster status
What is the status of the cluster

Intents.name: get_archived_amount
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to retrieve amount of data archived

utterances.utterance: How much data has been archived
Give the the details of the archival storage
What is the amount of archived data
What is my archival capacity

Intents.name: get_cluster_storage_details
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to retrieve the available space on a cluster

utterances.utterance: What is the capacity of the cluster
How much space is available on the cluster
How much space is used on the cluster
Give me the cluster storage details

Intents.name: get_data_growth_rate
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to retrieve data growth rates

utterances.utterance: How is my data growing
How fast is my data growing
What is the amount of data growth
Rate of data growth
What is the rate of my data growth

Intents.name: get_node_count
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to determine number of nodes within Rubrik cluster

utterances.utterance: What is the node count
How many nodes are in the cluster
What is the number of nodes in the cluster

Intents.name: get_remaining_runway
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to how much runway is left in terms of capacity

utterances.utterance: How much runway is left
How much runway do I have left
What is the remaining runway on my cluster

Intents.name: get_sla_compliance
Intents.description: Runs lambda function to report on SLA Compliance

utterances.utterance: How are my SLAs doing
Are my SLAs in compliance
Give me the SLA Compliance summary
